org.openimaj.image.feature.global

Class HueStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.mask.AbstractMaskedObject<FImage>
      • org.openimaj.image.feature.global.HueStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>, ImageAnalyser<MBFImage>, MaskedObject<FImage>

    public class HueStats
extends AbstractMaskedObject<FImage>
implements ImageAnalyser<MBFImage>, FeatureVectorProvider<DoubleFV>
    A two-valued summary representing mean hue (in radians) and variance of hue respectively. Additionally, can produce a classification for black & white versus colour versus sepia images based on hand-coded (and not well tested) parameters.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  HueStats.ToneAttr
      Tonal attributes for images based on the mean hue and variance.
